description: Temporary Help Services Requirement. This requirement is for: Fisheries and Oceans Canada. This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: 8.3 Financial management – One Senior Consultant.
duration_in_months: . Niveau d'effort estimé du contrat sera de : 1300 heures
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
full_summary:
**Temporary Help Services Requirement**

**Notice No.:** cb-4578-8063699, Amendment No. 1

**Publication Date:** April 11, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** April 17, 2023, at 14:00 (EDT)

**Project Title:** Temporary Help Services Requirement

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Description:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is soliciting proposals for temporary help services from qualified SA Holders under EN578-172870. The requirement is for One Senior Consultant in Financial Management.

**Eligible Suppliers:**

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. 8513929 Canada Inc.
2. A Hundred Answers Inc.
3. Barbara Personnel Inc.
4. Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
5. Excel Human Resources Inc.
6. Gartner Canada Co.
7. I4C INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CONSULTING INC.
8. KPMG LLP
9. Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. (Joint Venture)
10. Maplesort Consulting Inc.
11. NATTIQ INC.
12. OLAV Consulting Corp.
13. OLAV CONSULTING CORP. MOSHAWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION (Joint Venture)
14. Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
15. Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
16. Prologic Systems Ltd.
17. QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
18. Quallium Corporation
19. Samson & Associés CPA/Consultation Inc.
20. Spirit Personnel Inc.
21. TDV Global inc.
22. Teambuilder Consulting Inc.
23. THE LANSDOWNE CONSULTING GROUP INC.
24. The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated
25. Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
26. TRM Technologies Inc.

**Contract Details:**

* Expected start date: May 1, 2023
* Expected end date: March 31, 2024
* Estimated level of effort: 1300 hours
* Security requirement: Secret

**Proposed Method of Supply:**

This tender is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Interested parties may become a "Qualified SA Holder" by contacting [tpspsc.pasat-apths.pwgsc@tppsc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tpspsc.pasat-apths.pwgsc@tppsc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
